name: Fire Mountain Angry
description:
The volcano god is angry, and hungry for sacrifices.   Use your sling to hurl rocks at your fellow players and toss their corpses into the fire mountain.  But beware - the volcano is a temperamental god, and may repay your sacrifices with fire from the sky.

A local multiplayer caveman brawler for 2 to 4 players.  ICT Game Jam Winter 2019 1st place winner.  Feel free to report any bugs or feedback in the comments :)

Requires at least 2 controllers (preferably Xbox).  A known issue exists where gamepad input won't be registered if the controller is turned on before the game launches - if this happens, just turn the controller off and back on again.

Gamepad controls:

  • [Left Stick]: Move
  • [A]: Jump
  • [Right Trigger]: Press and hold to attack
  • [X]: Pick up corpses/drop corpses/use slingshot
  • [Start]: Drop-in
